title: Minister of Energy and Water (Angola)
text: Minister of Energy and Water of Angola is a <a href="Cabinet%20%28government%29">cabinet</a> level position in the <a href="Politics%20of%20Angola">national government</a>. The position was established in 1975 with <a href="Ambr%C3%B3sio%20Lukoki">Ambrósio Lukoki</a>.
